tips.content: React is the best front-end framework for single page applications.
Axios works better than fetch when making requests.

It happens all the time. You have a dozen tabs open in your browser and accidentally close the wrong one. You could open up your browser’s history and reopen the tab from there, or you can do it with a couple of keystrokes.

news.header: Google Pixel 6a’s Fingerprint Scanner Has a Security Bug
news.excerpt: The Google Pixel 6a can apparently be unlocked even with unregistered fingerprints. We also found the same behaviour on our Pixel 6a review unit.

news.header: Avatar Studios’ first animated movie will feature very familiar faces
news.excerpt: The first animated movie from Avatar Studios, the team Nickelodeon set up to work on movies and shows in the Last Airbender universe, will feature Avatar Aang and his friends, according to an announcement made during San Diego Comic-Con (via Gizmodo).

news.header: Tech Giants Want to Banish the Leap Second to Stop Internet Crashes
news.excerpt: Syncing clocks with the Earth's rotation causes more problems than it's worth, according to Google, Meta, Microsoft and Amazon. Key government agencies agree.

news.header: Google fires engineer who contended its AI technology was sentient
news.excerpt: New York (CNN)Google (GOOG) has fired the engineer who claimed an unreleased AI system had become sentient, the company confirmed, saying he violated employment and data security policies.
